      • toJava

        public Object toJava(JSONMapper mapper,
            JSONValue aValue,
            Class<?> aRequestedClass)
              throws MapperException
        Description copied from interface: ClassMapper
        Map an instance from the JSON model to Java.
        Specified by:
        toJava in interface ClassMapper
        Parameters:
        mapper - The JSONMapper is passed as an argument for recursive mappings or to access the mapping options.
        aValue - The JSON object that we want to convert.
        aRequestedClass - The target Java class in which we want to convert the JSON object.
        Returns:
        The Java instance.
        Throws:
        MapperException - If the mapping cannot be done.

      • toJSON

        public JSONValue toJSON(JSONMapper mapper,
               Object aPojo)
                 throws MapperException
        Description copied from interface: ClassMapper
        Map a Java instance to an instance of the JSON model.
        Specified by:
        toJSON in interface ClassMapper
        Parameters:
        mapper - The JSONMapper is passed as an argument for recursive mappings or to access the mapping options.
        aPojo - The Java instance that we want to convert the JSON model.
        Returns:
        The JSON instance in which we want to map the Java pojo.
        Throws:
        MapperException - If the mapping cannot be done.
